title: The Death of Sarah
summary: Genesis 23 recounts the death of Sarah and Abraham's negotiation to buy the cave of Machpelah as a burial site. This marks the first piece of the promised land Abraham legally owns.

faq.question: Where was Sarah buried?
faq.answer: In the cave of Machpelah near Hebron.

faq.question: Why is the purchase of the cave important?
faq.answer: It’s the first recorded land ownership by Abraham in Canaan—the promised land.
